pages.text: 6|45|to unakee jad kaat dee gayee, jinhonne atyaachaar kiya aur sab prashansa allaah hee ke lie hai, jo poore vishv ka paalanahaar hai.

6|46|(he nabee!) aap kahen ki kya tumane isapar bhee vichaar kiya ki yadi allaah tumhaare sunane tatha dekhane kee shakti chheen le aur tumhaare dilon par muhar laga de, to allaah ke siva kaun hai, jo tumhen ise vaapas dila sake? dekho, ham kaise baar-baar aayaten[1] prastut kar rahe hain, phir bhee ve munh[2] pher rahe hain.
6|47|aap kahen ki kabhee tumane is baat par vichaar kiya ki yadi tumapar allaah kee yaatana achaanak ya khul kar aa jaaye, to atyaachaariyon (mushrikon) ke siva kisaka vinaash hoga

6|48|aur ham rasoolon ko, iseelie bhejate hain ki ve (aagyaakaariyon ko) shubh soochana den tatha (avagyaakaariyon ko) daraayen. to jo eemaan laaye tatha apane karm sudhaar lie, unake lie koee bhay nahin aur na vah udaaseen honge.
6|49|aur jinhonne hamaaree aayaton ko jhuthalaaya, unhen apanee avagya ke kaaran yaatana avashy milegee.

6|50|(he nabee!) aap kah den ki mere paas allaah ka kosh nahin hai, na main paroksh ka gyaan rakhata hoon aur na main ye kahata hoon ki main koee farishta hoon. main to keval useepar chal raha hoon, jo meree or vahyee (prakaashana) kee ja rahee hai. aap kahen ki kya andha[1] tatha aankh vaala baraabar ho jaayenge? kya tum soch vichaar nahin karate

6|51|aur is (vahyee) ke dvaara unhen sachet karo, jo is baat se darate hon ki ve apane paalanahaar ke paas (pralay ke din) ekatr kiye jaayenge, is dasha mein ki allaah ke siva koee sahaayak tatha anushansak (sifaarishee) na hoga, sambhavatah ve aagyaakaaree ho jaayen.

6|52|(he nabee!) aap unhen apane se door na karen, jo apane paalanahaar kee vandana praatah sandhya karate evan usakee prasannata kee chaah mein lage rahate hain. unake haisaab ka koee bhaar aapapar nahin hai aur na aapake haisaab ka koee bhaar unapar[1] hai, atah yadi aap unhen door karenge, to atyaachaariyon mein ho jaayenge.
